item.title: Sexual misconduct allegations didn’t stop Trump picking these candidates
item.description: Several of the president-elect’s selections for top jobs in his administration have faced accusations of sexual misconduct.

item.title: No Labels goes after opponents of third-party presidential bid in court
item.description: Documents already unsealed by the courts reveal remarkable details about the private proposals for a wide range of hard-nosed tactics that went beyond...

item.title: Trump is coming for the executive branch. Does he know what he’s doing?
item.description: The president-elect has signaled he will be destructive, but he seems motivated by retribution rather than saving money.

item.title: Fred R. Harris, Oklahoma senator on Kerner Commission, dies at 94
item.description: Mr. Harris, a liberal populist, was once considered one of the bright young faces of the Democratic Party. He twice ran for president and chaired the ...

item.title: Sharp elbows and raised voices: Inside Trump’s bumpy transition
item.description: His freewheeling team has returned to the patterns of his first term in office — with shouting matches, expulsions from meetings and name-calling.
